programme.title: BBC Wales Investigates
programme.desc: Reporter Steffan Powell delves into the murky world of ticket touts after all the commotion over Oasis tickets. He investigates why the odds are stacked against many people securing tickets for high-profile events.

programme.title: Inside the US Military Transgender Ban
programme.sub-title: Inside the US Military Transgender Ban
programme.desc: President Trump has fulfilled campaign promises to ban transgender troops from the U.S. military; this film follows two transgender officers as the policy took effect.
